00040   call initialize()

00042   ! run problem
00043   call run_problem()

00046   call finalize()

00053 !===============================================================================
00054 ! INTIALIZE
00057 
00058   subroutine initialize()
00059 
00060     use hdf5
00061     use global,    only: seed,allocate_problem,mat,tal,emax,emin,time_init,    &
00062    &                     compute_macro_cross_sections
00063     use input,     only: read_input
00064     use materials, only: compute_macroxs
00065     use output,    only: print_heading
00066     use timing,    only: timer_start,timer_stop
00067 
00068     ! local variables
00069     integer :: error ! hdf5 error
00070     real(8) :: rn    ! initial random number
00071 
00072     ! begin timer
00073     call timer_start(time_init)
00074 
00075     ! initialize the fortran hdf5 interface
00076     call h5open_f(error)
00077 
00078     ! print heading information
00079     call print_heading()
00080 
00081     ! read input
00082     call read_input()
00083 
00084     ! initalize random number generator
00085     rn = rand(seed)
00086 
00087     ! precompute macroscopic cross section of materials
00088     call compute_macro_cross_sections()
00089 
00090     ! end timer
00091     call timer_stop(time_init)
00092 
00093   end subroutine initialize
00094 
00095 !===============================================================================
00096 ! RUN_PROBLEM
00099 
00100   subroutine run_problem()
00101 
00102     use global,    only: nhistories,mat,neut,eidx,emin,bank_tallies,time_run
00103     use particle,  only: init_particle
00104     use physics,   only: sample_source,perform_physics,get_eidx
00105     use timing,    only: timer_start,timer_stop
00106 
00107     ! local variables
00108     integer :: i  ! iteration counter
00109 
00110     ! begin timer
00111     call timer_start(time_run)
00112 
00113     ! begin loop over histories
00114     do i = 1,nhistories
00115 
00116       ! intialize history
00117       call init_particle(neut)
00118 
00119       ! sample source energy
00120       call sample_source()
00121 
00122       ! begin transport of neutron
00123       do while (neut%alive)
00124 
00125         ! call index routine for first tally
00126         eidx = get_eidx(neut%E)
00127 
00128         ! perform physics and also records collision tally
00129         call perform_physics()
00130 
00131         ! check for energy cutoff
00132         if (neut%E < emin) neut%E = 1.1e-11_8 
00133 
00134       end do
00135 
00136       ! neutron is dead if out of transport loop (ecut or absorb) --> bank tally
00137       call bank_tallies()
00138 
00139       ! print update to user
00140       if (mod(i,nhistories/10) == 0) then
00141         write(*,'(/A,1X,I0,1X,A)') 'Simulated',i,'neutrons...'
00142       end if
00143 
00144     end do
00145 
00146     ! end timer
00147     call timer_stop(time_run)
00148 
00149 
00150   end subroutine run_problem
00151 
00152 !===============================================================================
00153 ! FINALIZE
00156 
00157   subroutine finalize()
00158 
00159     use global, only: finalize_tallies,deallocate_problem
00160     use hdf5
00161     use output, only: write_output
00162 
00163     ! local variables
00164     integer :: error ! hdf5 error
00165 
00166     ! calculate statistics on tallies
00167     call finalize_tallies()
00168 
00169     ! write output
00170     call write_output()
00171  
00172     ! deallocate problem
00173     call deallocate_problem()
00174 
00175     ! close the fortran interface
00176     call h5close_f(error)
00177 
00178   end subroutine finalize
00179 
00180 end program main
